pr_title: Populate consensus_(start|end) for historical entries in t_record_files and fix name column

timeline.message:
add flyway db migration script to populate consensus_start and consensus_end for historic rows in t_record_files

store file name not the full file path in EventFile.name

use file name instead of full file path for name field of RecordFile and EventFile

timeline.bodyText: Can we change parseRecordFile to take in a File instead of using this logic?
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText: sure. and the change is bigger than I thought.
replies.author: xin-hedera

replies.bodyText: We shouldn't remove StreamFileData. The purpose of that file is to abstract out the fact that we're storing the stream file on the filesystem in case we want to store it in a queue or the database in the future. I just meant the minimal change to the RecordFileDownloader to pass File. For RecordFileParser, can just construct a new File(streamFileData.getFilename()). Or we can just revert last commit and leave as is and revist later.
replies.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText:
i'll revert the last commit and just change the signature of Utility.recordFileParser.
A relevant question, is StreamFileData.filename supposed to be the file name or the full file path? I have to change both RecordStreamFileListener.onStart(StreamFileData) implementations since it checks duplication against t_record_files using the StreamFileData.filename.
With t_record_files.name updated to the file name, I have to either change StreamFileData.filename to match t_record_files.name or change onStart implementation to get file name from full file path (yes, current implementation saves full pauth in StreamFileData.filename).
replies.author: xin-hedera

timeline.message:
use file name instead of file path to query t_record_files to check duplicate

Signed-off-by: Xin Li <xin.li@swirlds.com>

use file name instead of file path to query t_record_files to check duplicate
